text: Barelli is a comics series featuring an eponymous character, created by Bob de Moor, which first appeared in the Franco-Belgian comics magazine Tintin on July 27, 1950. Barelli made sporadic serial runs throughout the 1950s, 1960s and 1970s while 8 albums in the series were released by Lombard and Bédescope. Cover of the album publication L'enigmatique monsieur Barelli (1956) ==Synopsis== Barelli is a theatre actor who often finds himself caught up in dangerous adventures. ==Bibliography== ===Serialised stories=== # L'enigmatique monsieur Barelli (Tintin, 30/1950 - 9/1951) # Barelli a nusa penida (Tintin, 10/1951 - 20/1952.
